title: Morgan Wallen, Garth Brooks, Taylor Swift & More Artists With Most Weeks at No. 1 on Top Country Albums Chart: Full¬†List
summary: Male solo artists dominate, though three female solo artists and two groups have also achieved the feat.
body: Morgan Wallen ‚Äôs I’m the Problem leads Billboard ‘s Top Country Albums chart (dated Jan. 17) for the 34th consecutive week. This ups Wallen’s career tally of weeks at No. 1 to 220, allowing him to extend his lead as the artist with the most weeks at No. 1 in the chart’s 62-year history. Wallen‚Äôs achievement is especially impressive because he has amassed this hefty total of weeks at No. 1 in such a short amount of time. He first topped the chart on Aug. 15, 2020. Top Country Albums originated as Hot Country Albums in the Jan. 11, 1964 issue of Billboard . Johnny Cash ‚Äôs Ring of Fire (The Best of Johnny Cash) headed the inaugural chart. The compilation was well-timed: ‚ÄúRing of Fire‚Äù had headed Hot Country Songs for seven weeks the previous summer and had crossed over to reach the top 20 on the Billboard Hot 100. The chart was named Hot Country LP‚Äôs from 1968 to 1984, when vinyl LPs were king. Twenty-one artists have logged 50 or more weeks at No. 1 on Top Country Albums. Male solo artists dominate, as you might expect, though three female solo artists have achieved the feat, as have two groups. (One of those groups is an all-female group.) Only one Black art‚Ä¶

title: Taylor Swift, The Beatles, Elvis & More Artists With the Most Weeks at No. 1 on the Billboard 200: Full¬†List
summary: Swift is the top solo artist on the list, and the top American artist.
body: By returning to No. 1 on the Billboard 200 (dated Jan. 17) for a 13th nonconsecutive week with I‚Äôm the Problem, Morgan Wallen ups his career total of weeks at No. 1 on that chart to 42. That tally is topped by only seven acts in history ‚Äî and by only three male solo artists: Elvis Presley , Garth Brooks and Michael Jackson . Wallen, 32, is the youngest artist on our list of artists who have logged 30 or more weeks at No. 1 on the Billboard 200. Taylor Swift , who he bumped from the No. 1 spot this week, is 36. A few quick notes: While Presley’s feats on the Billboard Hot 100 are shortchanged by the fact that his breakthrough in 1956 pre-dated the launch of Billboard ‚Äôs flagship songs chart by more than two years, the Billboard 200 captures Presley‚Äôs entire career. His debut album, Elvis Presley , entered the chart at No. 11 in the issue dated March 31, 1956 ‚Äî which was the chart‚Äôs second week. If you count the  Saturday Night Fever  soundtrack (which logged 24 weeks at No. 1 in 1978) as a  Bee Gees  album, the trio had 31 weeks on top. Bee Gees had six tracks on the album ‚Äî five of which were No. 1 hits on the Hot 100. But  Billboard  counts it ‚Ä¶

title: Morgan Wallen‚Äôs ‚ÄòI‚Äôm the Problem‚Äô Rebounds for 13th Week at No. 1 on Billboard¬†200
summary: Plus, Olivia Dean‚Äôs The Art of Loving reaches the top three for the first time.
body: For the first time in four months, Morgan Wallen ‚Äôs I‚Äôm the Problem is back at No. 1 on the Billboard 200 albums chart, as the set climbs 2-1 on the list dated Jan. 17. The set collects its 13th nonconsecutive week atop the list, and its first since the Aug. 30, 2025-dated chart. The album debuted at No. 1 on the May 31, 2025, chart and spent 12 nonconsecutive weeks in the lead beginning with its debut frame. Related Taylor Swift, The Beatles, Elvis & More Artists With the Most Weeks at No. 1 on the Billboard 200: Full List Iman Honors David Bowie on 10th Anniversary of His Death Bob Weir Remembered by Andy Cohen, Don Felder & More After His Death at 78 I‚Äôm the Problem earned 85,000 equivalent album units in the United States in the week ending Jan. 8, according to Luminate, with the bulk of that sum driven by streaming activity of its songs. Meanwhile, Olivia Dean ‚Äôs The Art of Loving continues to scale to new heights on the Billboard 200, hitting a new peak as it rises 4-3. It also posts new plateaus on the Top Album Sales and Top Streaming Albums charts. The Billboard 200 chart ranks the most popular albums of the week in the U.S. based on multi-metric consumption ‚Ä¶

title: ‚ÄòWicked: For Good‚Äô Nears $525 Million in Worldwide Grosses: Full List of Top-Grossing Film Adaptations of Broadway¬†Musicals
summary: The smash sequel is just the third adaptation of a Broadway musical to top the $500 million mark.
body: Wicked: For Good has grossed $522.3 million worldwide in its first eight weeks at the boxoffice, which puts it at No. 3 on Billboard ‚Äôs list of the top-grossing films that are adapted from Broadway musicals. Our list is drawn from boxofficemojo.com‚Äôs running tally of the 1,000 top-grossing films of all time in terms of worldwide grosses. Both Wicked: for Good and its predecessor, 2024‚Äôs Wicked , were adapted from the 2003 Broadway musical Wicked . The first Wicked film opened on Nov. 22, 2024. In just five weeks, it pulled ahead of Mamma Mia! to become the top-grossing film adapted from a Broadway musical. Wicked received 10 Oscar nominations on Jan. 23, 2025, including nods for both of its stars, Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande . It won two awards at the Oscars ceremony on March 2, 2025 ‚Äî best costume design and best production design. Nominations for the 2026 Oscars will be announced on Thursday Jan. 22. Both Wicked and Wicked: For Good were directed by Jon M. Chu, whose hit-studded r√©sum√© includes a previous film adaptation of a Broadway musical, the 2021 movie version of Lin-Manuel Miranda ‚Äôs breakout hit In the Heights . Eight film adaptations of Broadway musicals appear on B‚Ä¶

title: ‚ÄòSpringsteen: Deliver Me From Nowhere‚Äô Wins Best Period Film at 2026 AARP Movies for Grownups Awards: Full Winners¬†List
summary: Adam Sandler received a career achievement award from pal Henry Winkler.
body: Springsteen: Deliver Me From Nowhere , the biopic about a pivotal period in the life of Bruce Springsteen , was named best period film at the 2026 Movies for Grownup Awards with AARP, which were presented on Saturday (Jan. 10) at the Beverly Wilshire Hotel in Beverly Hills, Calif. The Springsteen film, which fell short of expectations but was by no means a bomb, beat Dead Man‚Äôs Wire , Marty Supreme , Nuremberg and Sinners in that category. Related ‚ÄòSpringsteen: Deliver Me From Nowhere‚Äô Ranks in the Top 20 on Billboard‚Äôs List of Music Biopics With the Highest Worldwide Grosses Adam Sandler’s All ‘Grownup’: Actor to Receive AARP Career Achievement Award ‘Becoming Led Zeppelin’ Directors Share the Story of the Rock Doc’s Uphill Battle Another film about a legendary rock act came up short at the Movies for Grownup Awards. Becoming Led Zeppelin lost best documentary to My Mom Jayne , actress Mariska Hargitay‚Äôs film about her late mother, 1960s sex symbol Jayne Mansfield. The Movies for Grownups Awards honor films and television projects that celebrate the voices and stories of those who are 50-plus. This year‚Äôs show, hosted by Alan Cum‚Ä¶

title: Kelly Clarkson Shares Rare Update on Her Kids After Ex Brandon Blackstock‚Äôs¬†Death
summary: Blackstock passed away in August 2025 after a battle with cancer.
body: Kelly Clarkson is sharing a rare update about her family following the death of her ex-husband, Brandon Blackstock. In a brief fan Q&A posted on the official Kelly Clarkson Show YouTube channel , the 43-year-old pop star and talk show host was asked about one thing she does every day that brings her joy. Her answer centered on her two children with Blackstock, daughter River and son Remington. “Snuggle,” Clarkson said. “My kids, they’re 9 and 11. They’re at that special little fun stage where they can wipe their own behinds, but they’re still small enough to love cuddling and love snuggles.” She continued, “There’s been a lot for our family recently, and so I have allowed my kids to sleep with me quite a bit. It’s my two dogs, my two kids and me. It’s a lot. It’s been really special, though, because the conversations you have during that time are pretty cute. So that’s probably my favorite time of day.” The Q&A, shared Saturday (Jan. 10), comes five months after Blackstock‚Äôs passin g at 48 in August 2025 from cancer. He had been diagnosed with melanoma three years earlier. Clarkson was marr‚Ä¶

title: Ganges Delta Under a Winter Shroud of Fog
summary: Low clouds blanketed the delta while parallel cloud bands rolled over the Bay of Bengal during a January cold wave.
body: Earth Observatory Science Earth Observatory Ganges Delta Under a Winter‚Ä¶ Earth Earth Observatory Image of the Day EO Explorer Topics All Topics Atmosphere Land Heat & Radiation Life on Earth Human Dimensions Natural Events Oceans Remote Sensing Technology Snow & Ice Water More Content Search Collections Global Maps World of Change Articles Notes from the Field Blog Earth Matters Blog Blue Marble: Next Generation EO Kids Mission: Biomes About About Us Subscribe üõú RSS Contact Us January 6, 2026 Winter weather took hold across the Indo-Gangetic Plain in early January 2026, bringing dense fog and cold temperatures to much of the flat, fertile lands that span from Pakistan and northern India to Bangladesh. This image shows low-lying clouds over the delta on the morning of January 6, captured by the MODIS (Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer) on NASA‚Äôs Terra satellite. Dense fog, particularly radiation fog , is common this time of year, forming when ground temperatures are cool, winds are light, and moisture is abundant near the surface.
